title: Triangle Lovers
description:
Description :
        "My beloved Haneul Hyung... Is trash? And his big (?) guy is his lover? But... He still wants to do it together?" Geonwoo, came to the hotel, heart aflutter, to finally spend the night with the cute, pretty, and lovely Haneul. However, it was Jiho, a strikingly  handsome man, who opened the door, with Haneul Hyung behind him. Are the two of them lovers? And what about the three of us? He wants to leave Haneul, who tells him to just go if he doesn't want to do it. But Geonwoo, angry at the idea of Haneul spending the night with Jiho instead of him, agrees to 3p..."?!"But I'm the one who should be sulking?
